segments.text: Mr . Li , does the recommendation of the university play an important role in job hitting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . In fact , the recommendation is a way of indirect self-recommendation . The university and the business have a long-term relationship . If you are recommended by your university , you can be approved more easily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I doubt the authority because most of the recommendation letters of the university are the same .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More and more people have the same discoveries since most of the universities do that in order to save effort .
segments.speaker: S2
